story: CipherText is a software engineering company focused on building reliable digital systems for critical sectors. We started with a simple mission: create software that works, scales, and lasts. Our approach combines modern technology with thoughtful engineering—no shortcuts, no hype, just solid systems that solve real problems.
philosophy: Quality over speed—we build things right the first time
Long-term thinking—systems designed to evolve with your needs
Transparency—clear communication throughout the development process
Responsibility—we stand behind everything we build

founder.name: Founder Name
founder.note: I started CipherText because I saw too many organizations struggling with unreliable software. We focus on healthcare, governance, and data platforms because these sectors need dependable systems more than most. Every project we take on, we treat as if we're building it for ourselves.
